text:
Welcome to the Lenya Website Redesign Contest.
You can find the documentation of the Contest here: [TODO: add the link as soon as the page is live].

Please attach Your contributions to this Bugzilla Entry. Please Be aware that by attaching Your artwork here it is thereby licensed unter the terms of the Apache Software Foundation License.

Thanks in advance for Your contribution to Apache Lenya - we are looking forward to see your design ideas for the Lenya website!
creator: ragaller@apache.org
